name: Megha Kumari
position: Lead Data Scientist at Paytm | ex-Barclays | IIT Kharagpur
about: Experienced Data Scientist with a demonstrated history of working in the financial services industry. Skilled in Data Analysis, machine learning , AI, Gen AI tools, R programming , Python , SQL , tableau, SAS and other analytics tools. Strong business development professional with a Bachelor of Technology (BTech) from Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur.

current_company.name: Paytm
current_company.title: Lead Data Scientist at Paytm | ex-Barclays | IIT Kharagpur

positions.subtitle: Paytm
positions.description: - Collaborated with cross-functional teams including data analysts, software developers, and business stakeholders to define project objectives, requirements, and success criteria.  - Conducted extensive data exploration and analysis on historical merchant data to identify key features and patterns influencing lead conversion.- Developed predictive models using machine learning algorithms such as random forests, and gradient boosting machines to predict the likelihood of merchant conversions to Lending portfolio based on various demographic, behavioral, and transactional factors.- Integrated the Merchant Kernel Score system into the company's CRM platform and lead management workflow, providing scores and prioritization of merchant leads for sales and marketing teams.Achievements:- Successfully deployed the Merchant Kernel Score system, enabling the company to prioritize high-value merchant leads and allocate resources more efficiently, resulting in a 20% increase in lead conversion rates.- Implemented continuous monitoring and refinement processes to ensure the Merchant Kernel Score system remains accurate and effective over time, incorporating feedback from sales and marketing teams to improve model performance and relevance.- Presented project findings and insights to senior management, demonstrating the business impact of the Merchant Kernel Score system and its contribution to the company's strategic goals.
positions.title: Lead Data Scientist
positions.description_html:
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams including data analysts, software developers, and business stakeholders to define project objectives, requirements, and success criteria.

- Conducted extensive data exploration and analysis on historical merchant data to identify key features and patterns influencing lead conversion.

- Developed predictive models using machine learning algorithms such as random forests, and gradient boosting machines to predict the likelihood of merchant conversions to Lending portfolio based on various demographic, behavioral, and transactional factors.

- Integrated the Merchant Kernel Score system into the company's CRM platform and lead management workflow, providing scores and prioritization of merchant leads for sales and marketing teams.

Achievements:

- Successfully deployed the Merchant Kernel Score system, enabling the company to prioritize high-value merchant leads and allocate resources more efficiently, resulting in a 20% increase in lead conversion rates.

- Implemented continuous monitoring and refinement processes to ensure the Merchant Kernel Score system remains accurate and effective over time, incorporating feedback from sales and marketing teams to improve model performance and relevance.

- Presented project findings and insights to senior management, demonstrating the business impact of the Merchant Kernel Score system and its contribution to the company's strategic goals.

positions.subtitle: Paytm
positions.description: -Price Sensitivity Model: Built a Price sensitivity model using the concept of uplift modeling to implement Platform fees across various utilities on Paytm such as Mobile prepaid/postpaid recharges, electricity, broadband, etc. This model helped in generating a revenue of over 6.5 Cr in 2 months without impacting the overall customer churn rate. It helped businesses meet their AOPs.-CLTV (Customer Lifetime Value): Built a customer lifetime value prediction model using clustering and RFM analysis, which predicts a customer's lifetime value on Paytm. This model enabled product and growth teams to better target their campaigns and generate more leads.-Customer Trust Score: This model was built to curtail fraudulent activities on the Wallet transactions on Paytm. It generates a score ( 0 to 1) for each user indicating the possibility of fraud by the user. This model has helped in blocking fraudulent transactions and controlling the fraud rate at 5bps.
positions.title: Assistant Manager
positions.description_html:
-Price Sensitivity Model: Built a Price sensitivity model using the concept of uplift modeling to implement Platform fees across various utilities on Paytm such as Mobile prepaid/postpaid recharges, electricity, broadband, etc. This model helped in generating a revenue of over 6.5 Cr in 2 months without impacting the overall customer churn rate. It helped businesses meet their AOPs.
-CLTV (Customer Lifetime Value): Built a customer lifetime value prediction model using clustering and RFM analysis, which predicts a customer's lifetime value on Paytm. This model enabled product and growth teams to better target their campaigns and generate more leads.
-Customer Trust Score: This model was built to curtail fraudulent activities on the Wallet transactions on Paytm. It generates a score ( 0 to 1) for each user indicating the possibility of fraud by the user. This model has helped in blocking fraudulent transactions and controlling the fraud rate at 5bps.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: •Sentiment Analysis: Built a sentiment analysis tool in Python by making use of NPS data and reviewsprovided by customers across various Barclays channels. This NLP tool was able to identify and point out essential features contributing to the negative as well as positive reviews provided by the customer with an accuracy of 89 %. •BMB-AID Pilot: Built an analytics engine using R programming that makes use of activity logs of various digital channels of Barclays, it identifies and predicts the possible customer journey across these channels, it further identifies the customer journeys which failed or were abandoned.• The root cause associated with failures of such journeys were also analyzed to give actionable insights to the stakeholders.• JIRA Automation: Wrote scripts in groovy to automate the task of creating an issue on Jira boardwhenever there is an outage across various components in the environment. The script sends automatic notifications in the form of an email as well to notify the outage.
experience.description_html: •Sentiment Analysis: Built a sentiment analysis tool in Python by making use of NPS data and reviewsprovided by customers across various Barclays channels. This NLP tool was able to identify and point out essential features contributing to the negative as well as positive reviews provided by the customer with an accuracy of 89 %. •BMB-AID Pilot: Built an analytics engine using R programming that makes use of activity logs of various digital channels of Barclays, it identifies and predicts the possible customer journey across these channels, it further identifies the customer journeys which failed or were abandoned.• The root cause associated with failures of such journeys were also analyzed to give actionable insights to the stakeholders.• JIRA Automation: Wrote scripts in groovy to automate the task of creating an issue on Jira boardwhenever there is an outage across various components in the environment. The script sends automatic notifications in the form of an email as well to notify the outage.

experience.title: Data Science Internship
experience.description: MARUTI TRUE VALUE PRICING ENGINE •Built a Predictive Model by using Machine Learning techniques that would predict a tentative purchasing price by evaluating all the parameters of the car where historical data was used to Train, Test and Refine the model. •carried out various steps such as : Data pre-processing , Model designing and building , Model Analysis and Refinement, Model Testing and Model Validation with various techniques and algorithms using R programming NAVIGATION MODEL•Developed a navigation model by using R packages on maps and plots to identify the correct path taken to reach a specific location.
